title: i need a duo partner for ranked
body:
im bronze 4 atm and im desperately trying to climb but since i mostly play solo queue its basically impossible for me because i cant rely on 4 strangers to know their left from right.

last game we had an assume head start, i was fed, my support was awesome,  mid was fed, jglr was active... everything seemed great and it seemed like it finally had a decent team and would get an easy win boy i was wrong, by the time we were 25 mins in things started to fall apart because despite me pleading to group up and whatever my team refused to cooperate with each other, we had no teamwork whatsoever, except me and my support.

rumble got cocky and kept trying to 1v5 the enemies, and talon..oh god talon, the biggest problem for our team despite being fed for some unknown reason he just through his brain out the window and kept trying to invade the enemy jg 30 minutes in i have no idea why but even time he did he'd get chased down by the enemy team and killed and he kept doing this over and over and over again, completely ignored the team, never spoke a word or explained what he was trying to do but he just kept invading, getting caught out and dying over and over and would not stop, i swear i just got off a 14 day suspension im trying to reform and not rage at people but i swear to got bronze makes that so overbearingly hard, but in the end i kept my composer and didn't flame him. 
But anyways while the enemies chased down talon i would be trying to push side lanes but that was kind of hard because our base towers and a few inhibs were gone and i was defending from super minions which wouldn't have happened if our rumble didnt us tp across the map to kill morg while mid was being pushed in by the enemies right in front of him and he and ekko were the only ones still alive at the time (oh rumble died btw, didnt even kill morg). 

but anyways im about to start another ranked game but ya thats just been my experience for the passed few days in ranked, yesterday and the day before were worst because i had straight up trolls and intent feeders on my team.



update: just finished my ranked game where my jglr rage quit after saying (dont worry guys ill carry) in the lobby...pfft.
also my top lane teemo was split pushing enemy inhib while while the entire enemy team was in our base taking down  nexus towers and they won :P

replies.body: I started a group of Bronze/Low Silver players with 200 ranked games and 40%+ win ratios.  If that’s you add me.  Same name in game.  People don’t understand how garbage Bronze matchmaking is right now.  That is why I created the group.
exact same shit has been happnening to me i started this off seaoson silver v now im fkin bronze v because of sucky ass macthmaking
